DOC.brief_summary: This study aimed to evaluate the correlation between the point of care blood analysis obtained from skin puncture blood and conventional blood analysis obtained from venous and arterial blood.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of Point of Care Blood Analysis Obtained From Skin Puncture Blood
DOC.criteria: The patients who simultaneously require the venous blood test, skin puncture blood test and arterial blood gas analysis Unstable patients Patients receiving the medications affecting the results of blood analysis.
